name: jsc
description: JavaScript compiler that creates executable form .js file using C++ compiler
author: MaxCharlington

scripts.pretest: rm -rf /tmp/jsc-build && mkdir /tmp/jsc-build && bun run build && cmake -B build . -DBUILD_TESTS=1 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=build/install && bun run package && bun run local_install
scripts.test: build/tests/units/test_js && build/tests/units/test_runtime && build/tests/units/test_type_interop && bun run lint && node --test tests/integration/test_basic.js
scripts.package: cmake --install build/ --config Release && cpack --config build/CPackConfig.cmake -B build/
